S06n564:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-duradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena |
S06n564:3: duradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena parīttakuśalamūlena durmedhasā anarthikena alpaśrutena hīnaprajñena pāpamitropastabdhena aśuśrūṣaṇāparipṛcchakajātīyena kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvanabhiyuktena ||
S06n564:36: paramaduradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena |
S06n564:39: paramaduradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena |
S06n564:45: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiśca phalaviśuddhiśca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam |
S06n564:46: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito rūpaviśuddhī rupaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ |
S06n564:51: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiśca phalaviśuddhiśca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam |
S06n564:52: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito vijñānaviśuddhirvijñānaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ |
S06n564:53: punaraparaṃ subhūte yā rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ,
S06n564:55: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiśca sarvajñatāviśuddhiśca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam |
S06n564:61: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiśca sarvajñatāviśuddhiśca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam |
S06n564:64: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā |
S06n564:80: āha-na jānāti na saṃjānīte bhagavan prajñāpāramitā |
S06n564:82: āha-kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte?
S06n564:83: bhagavānāha-rūpaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte |
S06n564:87: vijñānaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte |
S06n564:111: āha-ya evamasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhagavan avabodhaḥ,
S06n564:114: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha-sā khalu punariyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nāpare tīre,
S06n564:118: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha-evamapi bhagavan saṃjñāsyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo riñciṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām |
S06n564:122: nāmato'pi hi subhūto saṅgo nimittato'pi saṅgaḥ |
S06n564:123: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā svākhyātā sunirdiṣṭā supariniṣṭhitā,
S06n564:126: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-katame te āyuṣman subhūte saṅgāḥ?
S06n564:130: atīteṣu dharmeṣvatītā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ |
S06n564:131: anāgateṣu dharmeṣvanāgatā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ |
S06n564:132: pratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu pratyutpannā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ |
S06n564:133: iyantaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasūyate bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prathamena cittotpādeneti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ ||
S06n564:134: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-katamena ārya subhūte paryāyeṇa saṅgaḥ?
S06n564:137: na ca cittaprakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā mahāyānasaṃprasthitena |
S06n564:138: tasmāttarhi kauśika paraṃ saṃdarśayatā samādāpayatā samuttejayatā saṃpraharṣayatā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūtānugamena saṃdarśayitavyaṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ samuttejayitavyaṃ saṃpraharṣayitavyam |
S06n564:140: buddhānujñātayā ca samādāpanayā paraṃ samādāpayati sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā |
S06n564:142: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06n564:144: tena hi subhūte anyānapi sūkṣmatarān saṅgānākhyāsyāmi,
S06n564:146: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
S06n564:149: bhagavānetadavocat-iha subhūte śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nimittato manasi karoti |
S06n564:154: iti hi so'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ye anāsravā dharmāstānanumode ityanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayati |
S06n564:155: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06n564:156: na sā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā |
S06n564:160: na sā śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ na nimittīkartuṃ nārambaṇīkartum |
S06n564:173: tathā hi subhūte akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ |
S06n564:175: bhagavānāha-tathāhi subhūte prakṛtyaiva na te dharmāḥ kiṃcit |
S06n564:188: evametāḥ subhūte sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti ||
S06n564:194: bhagavānāha-tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na cittena jñātavyā na cittagamanīyā |
S06n564:197: āha-tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kathaṃ caritavyam?
S06n564:198: bhagavānāha-sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna rūpe carati,
S06n564:200: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu |
S06n564:224: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadevaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sasaṅgatā ca asaṅgatā ca khyātāḥ |
S06n564:232: evaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
S06n564:245: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sasaṅgāsaṅgā iti na carati,
S06n564:257: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06n564:258: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu |
S06n564:265: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06n564:272: na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06n564:277: asaktā abaddhā amuktā asamatikrāntā hi subhūte sarvajñatā |
S06n564:278: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvasaṅgasamatikramāya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam ||
S06n564:289: rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhannākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06n564:301: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha-duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na saṃsīdati notplavate |
S06n564:308: ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa bhagavan saṃnaddhukāmo yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ badhnāti |
S06n564:310: śūro bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhukāmo'
S06n564:314: mahāvīryapāramitāsaṃnāhaprāptaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate ||
S06n564:315: atha khalvanyatamo bhikṣuryena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai |
S06n564:316: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati,
S06n564:318: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-ya ārya subhūte atra prajñāpāramitāyāmeva yogamāpatsyate,
S06n564:324: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-ājñāpayatu bhagavān |
S06n564:325: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karomi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayati |
S06n564:326: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyasi?
S06n564:328: subhūtirāha-evaṃ kauśika sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06n564:333: api ca kauśika ākāśasya sa rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
S06n564:334: yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
S06n564:335: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika pratibalastvaṃ pratiśrutkāyā rakṣāvaraṇagupti saṃvidhātum?
S06n564:337: subhūtirāha-evameva kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran viharan pratiśrutkopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti parijānāti |
S06n564:341: te ca dharmā na vidyante na saṃdṛśyante na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante iti viharati |
S06n564:344: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ,
S06n564:349: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte'tiṣṭhan |
S06n564:353: sahāpatiśca mahābrahmā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhasahasraṃ samānvāharanti sma |
S06n564:354: ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padairebhirevākṣaraiḥ subhūtināmadheyaireva bhikṣubhiriyameva prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭā,
S06n564:356: tatrāpi śakrā eva devendrāḥ paripṛcchanti sma,
S06n564:357: paripraśnayanti sma-asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe iyameva prajñāpāramitā bhāṣitā |
S06n564:359: nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe enāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate iti ||
